description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2655c","text":"This protocol describes isolation of nuclei from 10 week old whole mouse hearts from 8 founder strains (B6J, AJ, 129S1J, NZOJ, WSBJ, NODJ, PWKJ, and CASTJ), preparation of a single nucleus suspension, and fixation for single nucleus RNA-seq using Parse Biosciences and SHARE-seq using the Broad Institute protocol. We process 1 rep from each strain per day; e.g. female rep 1 across all 8 strains. The main products we use are Parse Biosciences Nuclei Fixation Kit (v2) and Miltenyi Biotec’s gentleMACS Octo Dissociator with accessories. This protocol takes about 3.5 hours from start to finish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rmed","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l1ic","text":"The results are 2 aliquots of fixed single-nucleus suspensions for Parse per each of the 8 samples, and 1 fixed nuclei pellet pooled across all 8 strains for SHARE-seq.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nkvt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"fi5q4","text":"We recommend using a 5 ml pipette for aspirations and resuspensions \u003e 1 ml, especially for heart.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7af2g","text":"Record everything in the IGVF spreadsheet, “Samples into experiment” tab.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":16}],"data":{}},{"key":"t93","text":"When possible, after nuclei isolation and during the first round of counting, 2 technicians should continue on with Parse fixation after establishing the volume needed for roughly 4 million nuclei per sample (4 samples processed per technician). The remaining technician should determine the exact volume needed for 1 million cells and proceed with SHARE-seq fixation. Parallel fixation saves about an hour of time.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C3415179439011EEA8450A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13M6-Ry6oXgkx94BHZOGioYPI6F_hWDqjGgcaNu2JNYs/edit#gid=636074467"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7296n","text":"Coat SHARE-seq nuclei prep tubes with BSA. Fill 8 1.5 ml tubes with 1.5 ml 1% BSA in H2O and incubate for 30 minutes. After incubation, aspirate BSA solution and dry for 30 minutes. Store at 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5fsbt","text":"Label tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8m99m","text":"Pre-chill centrifuge to 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"adei6","text":"Prepare ice buckets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4c24i","text":"Prepare 40 ml lysis buffer in a 50 ml conical tube on ice. Distribute 2 ml into 8 gentleMACS C Tubes on ice. Add 200 ul RNase inhibitor to the lysis buffer aliquot the day of the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17hjj","text":"Prepare 25 ml RSB in a 50 ml conical tube on ice. Add 125 ul RNase inhibitor the day of the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cot2g","text":"Prepare 3.5 ml nuclei buffer + BSA + RNase inhibitor (NB + BSA). 3.150 ml nuclei buffer, 350 ul 7.5% BSA, 44.1 ul RNase inhibitor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cpdvj","text":"Prepare 2.5 ml nuclei buffer + RNase inhibitor for final resuspension Add 31.5 ul RNase inhibitor to 2.5 ml nuclei buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blqml","text":"Prepare 15 ml SHARE-RSB in a 50 ml conical tube at room temperature. 30 ul digitonin, 37.5 ul Enzymatics RI, 18.75 ul SUPERase RI, and 150 ul yeast tRNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"78m1k","text":"Thaw components of 2 Parse Biosciences Nuclei Fixation v2 kits at room temperature, then place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79muu","text":"Distribute 20 ul NucBlue Fixed Cell ReadyProbes into 16 PCR strip tubes for cell counting. Need 8 tubes for counting after nuclei extraction, and another 8 tubes for final fixed nuclei.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dm9sh","text":"Keep flash frozen tissue samples on dry ice until lysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfk1o","text":"Drop whole frozen tissue into a chilled gentleMACS C Tube with 2.5 ml lysis buffer. Close tubes firmly and invert immediately, ensuring tissue is not stuck to the bottom or side. Keep tubes on ice and proceed immediately to dissociation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ijuq","text":"Run the gentleMACS Program 4C_nuclei_1 on the Octo Dissociator (~5 minutes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f6ji","text":"Remove tubes, ensuring tissue did not get stuck on the sides, and spin down in a 4C centrifuge for ~10 seconds to bring liquid to the bottom, then place tubes back on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73tj3","text":"Filter nuclei suspension through 70 um MACS SmartStrainer into a 5 ml tube. Fit a tube rack in ice for extra stability while filtering.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7h6mv","text":"Wash 70 um MACS SmartStrainer with 2 ml additional lysis buffer. Add 2 ml to C tubes, cap, and swish to recover any nuclei stuck to the sides and cap of the C tubes, then wash the strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0nlr","text":"Discard strainer and centrifuge the 4 ml nuclei suspension at 4C, 350g for 5 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5jsgo","text":"Resuspend nuclei pellet in 2.5 ml RSB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"586hf","text":"Filter nuclei suspension through 30 um MACS SmartStrainer into a 5 ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c63uk","text":"Count nuclei. Use 1:11 dilution factor, e.g. 2 ul + 20 ul dye.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5e3dh","text":"Set aside 4 million nuclei in RSB in a new 5 ml tube and spin down at 4C, 350g for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12i20","text":"Remove supernatant and and resuspend nuclei in 750 ul NB + BSA + RNase inhibitor through a 40 um strainer (provided in Parse Biosciences kit) into a new 5 ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c7r5n","text":"Add 250 uL Nuclei Fixation Solution and mix 3 times. Do not over-mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95dc3","text":"Incubate nuclei for 10 minutes on ice. Set 1 P200 pipettes to 80 ul and keep the P1000 at 250 ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bq65v","text":"Add 80 uL Nuclei Permeabilization Solution and mix by pipetting 3 times with the P1000 still set to 250 uL. Do not over-mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bklqv","text":"Incubate 3 minutes with nuclei on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1pbb","text":"Add 4 ml Nuclei Neutralization Solution and invert the tube once to mix. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f60as","text":"Centrifuge at 4C, 350g for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1dfnr","text":"Aspirate and discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ndss","text":"Resuspend the samples in 250 ul Nuclei Buffer with RNase inhibitor without BSA and add to a labeled 1.5 ml tube (skip filtering due to lower volume).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"o5tu","text":"Count nuclei. Use 1:11 dilution factor, e.g. 2 ul + 20 ul dye.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45b7o","text":"Add Nuclei DMSO: 5 uL and gently flick tubes to mix. One minute later, add another 5 uL and flick to mix, then after another minute add a final 5 uL for a total volume of 15 uL. Mix by gently pipetting 5x with a P200 set to 125 ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"60o6q","text":"Split nuclei suspension into 2 labeled tubes, 125 ul per tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amq84","text":"Place tubes in a Mr. Frosty at -80C. The next day, move tubes to boxes in -80C racks. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejvoe","text":"Move leftover nuclei suspension to labeled 2 ml tubes and spin at 4C, 750g for 5 minutes. Remove supernatant and flash-freeze nuclei in liquid nitrogen as dry pellets. Store at -80C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d108u","text":"Set aside 1 million nuclei for each of the 8 samples in RSB and spin down at 4C, 750g for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ovo6","text":"Remove supernatant and resuspend nuclei pellet in 1 ml room temperature SHARE-RSB. Transfer tube to a room temperature rack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8d2i5","text":"At RT, add 13.34 ul of methanol-free formaldehyde (16% stock solution). Final concentration for nuclei: 0.2%. Close tube and nutate  cells at RT for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"rr8l","text":"To quench fixation, per reaction, add 56.1 ul fresh 2.5M Glycine (0.94g per 5 ml stock), 50 ul of 1M Tris pH 8.0, 13.3ul of 7.5% BSA, and mix using a pipette. Incubate on ice for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eam87","text":"Spin 750g, 4C, 5 minutes. Gently remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fdf7","text":"Add 200 ul of SHARE-RSB and gently resuspend pellet. Store on ice until all samples are completed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5idph","text":"Pool 200 ul of resuspended nuclei from all 8 founders into 1 labeled 2 ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"854nr","text":"Spin 1,000g, 4C, 10 minutes. Gently remove supernatant. Remove all fluid and freeze at -80C as a dry pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protocol to isolate and fix nuclei from flash frozen mouse heart for IGVF
title_html: Protocol to isolate and fix nuclei from flash frozen mouse heart for IGVF
